articles.title: Xi tells Marcos that China is ready to restart oil exploration talks - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Philippine leader stresses cooperation amid South China Sea feud
articles.content: MANILA/HONG KONG -- Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday told visiting Philippine counterpart Ferdinand Marcos Jr. that Beijing is ready to restart discussions on joint oil and gas exploration, … [+484 chars]

articles.title: 'Generation gap': Pornsak leaves Mdada due to 'differences' with Michelle Chia and Addy Lee - AsiaOne
articles.description: We've moved from 2022 to 2023, but for livestreaming e-commerce platform Mdada, it's gone from three to two. In a surprise announcement on Instagram yesterday (Jan 2), actor-host Pornsak revealed that he has left Mdada. Pornsak is one of three famous personal…
